name: Guitar
description: The guitar's six strings define modern music...

name: Flute
description: The flute produces soft, soothing tones used in classical and folk music.

name: Saxophone
description: The saxophone is known for its expressive, rich sound in jazz and blues.

name: Trumpet
description: The trumpet delivers bright, powerful melodies used in orchestras and jazz bands.

name: Harp
description: The harp creates angelic, magical sounds with its plucked strings.

name: Tabla
description: The tabla is a classical Indian percussion instrument known for complex rhythms.

name: Sitar
description: The sitar creates rich, resonating sounds widely used in Indian classical music.

name: Cello
description: The cello produces deep, warm tones and is essential in modern orchestras.

name: Clarinet
description: The clarinet offers a smooth, mellow sound used in jazz, orchestral, and folk music.

name: Xylophone
description: The xylophone has bright, percussive tones created by striking wooden bars.

name: Accordion
description: The accordion produces unique, rich tones often heard in folk and world music.
